snippet.title: Gigantic Rampage Edition | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Unveiling Gigantic: Rampage Edition, the ultimate MOBA hero shooter experience from Gearbox Publishing Join the action-packed multiplayer adventure on April 9, 2024, across PC, PlayStation, and Xbox platforms for $19.99.

Sign up for Closed Beta -- gogigantic.com

Featuring dynamic gameplay, diverse heroes, and zero microtransactions, Gigantic: Rampage Edition promises an immersive gaming journey for both veterans and newcomers. Watch the announcement trailer now and gear up for epic battles!

Key Features:

- Explore new maps Picaro Bay and Heaven's Ward.
- Customize hero loadouts and unlock skins as you progress.
- Enjoy new game modes like Rush and classic Clash.
- Cross-platform play and free post-launch updates await!

Join the Closed Beta Testing on Steam starting February 22 at 12:00pm PST. Sign up now for a chance to experience the Rush mode firsthand! #GiganticRampageEdition #MOBA #HeroShooter #ClosedBetaTesting
